      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Checks if the entered parameters corresponds to a user in order to login to the system.
        Parameters:
        email - Inputed email by the user.
        password - Inputed password by the user.
        Returns:
        True if it is a successful login. False if it is an unsuccessful login.

      • createDirector

        public boolean createDirector(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.String name)
        Is used for a director to sign up to the system. Creates a director account
        Parameters:
        email - Desired email account (@urlms.ca by convention)
        password - Desired password. No restrictions.
        name - First and/or last name can be inputed.
        Returns:
        True if the database successfully saved the data. False for a saving error.

      • logout

        public boolean logout()
        Saves data and logs the user out of the system
        Returns:
        True if the database successfully saved the data. False otherwise.

      • addLaboratory

        public boolean addLaboratory(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String fieldOfStudy,
                             java.sql.Date startDate)
        Director creates a laboratory he is managing.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the laboratory.
        fieldOfStudy - The laboratory's field of study
        startDate - When the laboratory will begin research.
        Returns:
        True if the database successfully saved the laboratory. False if it did not and if a staff user tried to add a laboratory.

      • addStaff

        public boolean addStaff(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        ca.mcgill.ecse321.urlms.model.Staff.StaffRole role)
        Director adds a staff member to a selected laboratory. The parameters can be modified by the user within their profile.
        Parameters:
        name - First and/or last name of the new member
        email - Director assigns the email of the staff member.
        password - Director assigns a temporary password for the staff member.
        role - Whether the member is a research associate or a research assistant.
        Returns:
        True if the database successfully saved the laboratory. False if it did not and if a staff user tried to add a laboratory.
